name: moonlight ☽
description:
Info!

welcome to the story of moonlight where it lies on a little ball for a little adventure  at night !

you'll be portraying as a ball who'll be going through obstacles to obstacles while requiring patience and collecting all the stars to complete your task !

once you collect all the stars, you get a nice little ending <3

Controls!

use the w,a,s,d keys or the arrow keys to move, spacebar to jump or double jump, and the mouse as your camera control

Background!

this was a game design class project for 3 weeks and i finally finished it and hope you guys like it <3  i'll be updating it fairly soon, feedback and support is much appreciated and enjoy !
